newsitem.title: USA: GumTech to make, sell DHEA gum.
newsitem.headline: GumTech to make, sell DHEA gum.

text.p: GumTech International Inc said Friday it will make and sell chewing-gum product containing the hormone DHEA, which GumTech claims "helps restore energy and vitality that people lose as they age."
GumTech, a developer and marketer of nutrient chewing gum products worldwide, will produce he DHEA gum for Body Ammo, a marketer of DHEA products nationwide.

GumTech will also distribute the DHEA gum under the Body Ammo name, and it will distribute Body Ammo's other DHEA products including DHEA Skin Cream, DHEA Bone and Joint Formula and DHEA Antioxidants.
The product will be available at leading drug, grocery and health-food stores. Retail sales are estimated at about $20 million per year, GumTech said.
